Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    A population class to be part of an SIR simulation with a discrete number of acquaintances of each member of the population.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Population(int populationSize, int numContacts)
      A constructor method for the Population class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Person getPerson(int n)
      A method which returns the nth person of the population.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      A testing method for the class which creates a population of size 100 where everyone knows 5 other people
      int numAlive()
      This function returns the number of people that are alive in the population.
      int numInfected()
      This function returns the number of people that are infected in the population.
      int numRecovered()
      This function returns the number of people that are recovered in the population.
      void spreadVirus()
      A method that tells each person in the population to spread the virus.
      java.lang.String toString()
      A method to create a string that reports out Population Size Number Alive Number Infected Number Recovered

        public Population(int populationSize,
          int numContacts)
        A constructor method for the Population class
        Parameters:
        populationSize - an int that indicates the size of the population
        numContacts - an int that indicates the number of contacts each member of the population will have.

      • getPerson

        public Person getPerson(int n)
        A method which returns the nth person of the population.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
